parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Turns the Console on, when set to 1. Turns it off, when set to 0.

outputs.name: Power
outputs.description: Returns whether the Console is turned on and receives power. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Error
outputs.description: Returns whether the Console is flashing an error. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: Returns whether the Console is turned on. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: RequiredPower
outputs.description: Returns the current amount of power required by the Console, in watts.
